name: Thwok!
description:
"Think you've got what it takes to last more than 30 seconds in the pit beneath Harthor, try your best!"

Fight wave after wave of vicious and brutal foes in this arena combat game.

This is a blitz3d game - which uses old tech so you will most likely need to run Windows in compatibility mode to guarantee the game runs properly on modern machines.

Blitz3d Source Code is included

Version 101:Bug fixes and Enhancements.
